Class ConnectionImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.sonar.Conduit
us.mn.state.dot.sonar.server.ConnectionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection, SonarObject
public class ConnectionImpl extends Conduit implements Connection
A connection encapsulates the state of one client connection on the server.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • isWatchPositive

      protected static boolean isWatchPositive(Name name)
      Check if a name is watch positive. This means that the name can be used as a positive entry in the watching set.

    • isWatchNegative

      Check if a name is watch negative. This means that the name can be used as a negative entry in the watching set.
